author: IGN
description:
Daemons of the Shadow Realm will be streaming on Crunchyroll soon!

Based on the manga created by Hiromu Arakawa (Fullmetal Alchemist), Daemons of the Shadow Realm is set in a world where certain humans command mighty supernatural duos called Daemons. It is the birthright of "the children who sunder day and night"—twins Yuru and Asa—to rule over these powerful entities. Separated from a young age and unaware of the truth of their birth, brother and sister must fight to make their way back to each other, claim their birthright, and save the world...

#IGN #Anime
title: Daemons of the Shadow Realm - Official Trailer

description:

title: Florence Pugh, Hailee Steinfeld, and other MCU stars reprise their roles in Marvel Zombies! #disney

author: IGN
description:
Tojima Wants to Be a Kamen Rider will be streaming on Crunchyroll this October!

Tanzaburo Tojima, a forty-year-old man who is abnormally obsessed with the Kamen Rider franchise. Tojima is about to give up on his dream of becoming a hero until a chance encounter with a robber changes his fate forever.

#IGN #Anime
title: Tojima Wants to Be a Kamen Rider - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
A new saga begins! Black Clover Second Season is coming to Crunchyroll!

In a world where magic is everything, Asta and Yuno are both found abandoned at a church on the same day. While Yuno is gifted with exceptional magical powers, Asta is the only one in this world without any. At the age of fifteen, both receive grimoires, magic books that amplify their holder’s magic. Asta’s is a rare Grimoire of Anti-Magic that negates and repels his opponent’s spells. Being opposite but good rivals, Yuno and Asta are ready for the hardest of challenges to achieve their common dream: to be the Wizard King. Giving up is never an option!

#IGN #Anime
title: Black Clover Season 2 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON is coming to Crunchyroll October 4th! 

Deku and the heroes are plunged into a final battle against villains across Japan. Deku, by fully unleashing One For All Quirks, faces off against Shigaraki. A young and refreshed All For One faces Armored All Might, Quirkless in his powered armor suit. Will Deku be able to bring the story of how they all became the greatest heroes to its finale? Or will everything be destroyed?!

#IGN #Anime
title: My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
"Don't take drugs; watch The Paper!"

IGN sat down with co-creators/co-showrunners Greg Daniels and Michael Koman and cast members Domhnall Gleeson, Sabrina Impacciatore, and Chelsea Frei to discuss how this spin-off of The Office went for a less is more approach to make it a different kind of mockumentary.

The Paper premieres with four episodes on September 4, followed by two new episodes every Thursday through September 25 only on Peacock.
title: How The Office Spin-Off Avoids Repeating Itself | The Paper Cast and Crew Interview

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Joyful Limited Edition DualSense Controller Reveal Trailer for Astro Bot, the hit 3D action-adventure platformer developed by Team Asobi. Get a new look at the upcoming DuelSense controller featuring Astro Bot's excited eyes. The Astro Bot Joyful Limited Edition launches on October 30, with pre-orders starting on September 12.
title: Astro Bot - Official Joyful Limited Edition DualSense Controller Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join developer Edmund McMillen (creator of The Binding of Isaac and Super Meat Boy) for a deep dive into the gameplay of Mewgenics in this video for the upcoming endless cat breeding turn-based tactical roguelite RPG. In this 50-minute walkthrough, McMillen showcases gameplay and how a run works as the cats embark on an adventure to find food. McMillen discusses how cat class collars work once equipped, explains character stats, shows off combat, and more. Mewgenics will be available on PC on February 10, 2026.

#Mewgenics #Gaming #IGN
title: Mewgenics - 50-Minute Developer Gameplay Commentary Video

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the PC Features Trailer for Anno 117: Pax Romana, a city-building simulation game developed by Ubisoft. Get the rundown on all of the PC-specific features, including Ultra-wide support, 4K resolution, ray-tracing, Global Illumination, a Day and Night Cycle, and more for players to leverage. Anno 117: Pax Romana is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana - Official PC Features Trailer

author: IGN
description: The Prisoner from Dead Cells joins BlazBlue: Entropy Effect in a crossover update. Check out the BlazBlue: Entropy Effect x Dead Cells crossover trailer to see what to expect with this collaboration, which brings The Prisoner from Dead Cells as a playable character (along with 27 signature weapons, skills and mutations), an exclusive challenge biome to explore, and the ability to unlock four unique color swap skins for The Prisoner. BlazBlue: Entropy Effect is available now on PC, the App Store, and Google Play, and the BlazBlue: Entropy Effect x Dead Cells update is out now.
title: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect x Dead Cells Crossover - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tune in on Wednesday, September 3 at 11am PT / 2pm ET / 8pm CEST for the new PlayStation State of Play! Fans will be able to check out gameplay and deep dives from the upcoming, exciting new James Bond game: 007 First Light. 
Make sure to stick around after the presentation for a live episode of IGN's Podcast Beyond, where we'll break down all the reveals and gameplay that we'll see! 

#IGN #StateofPlay
title: State of Play September 2025 – 007 First Light Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Bad Cheese is available now on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S. Explore the game's unsettling world and check out the terrifying things that await in this Bad Cheese launch trailer for the psychological horror game inspired by the eerie charm of 1920s animation.

Step into the tiny paws of a mouse spending the weekend at home with a dysfunctional Dad while Mom's away. Be on your best behavior and KEEP DADDY HAPPY.
title: Bad Cheese - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Console Gameplay Overview Trailer for Republic of Pirates, a pirate simulation strategy game developed by Crazy Goat Games. Players will set out to establish settlements and make a name for themselves in the Golden Age of Piracy. Fight in real-time naval battles and explore the Caribbean to liberate islands, defeat rival factions, and navigate complex diplomatic relationships. Republic of Pirates is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S on September 25, with the game being available now for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Republic of Pirates - Official Console Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Meet the Tropeognathus in this latest Jurassic World Evolution 3 trailer for the upcoming sim game. Check it out to learn about this eye-catching pterosaur. Jurassic World Evolution 3 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on October 21, 2025.
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Tropeognathus Dinosaur Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
I Am Legend and Hunger Games franchise director Francis Lawrence pulls off a brutal, confronting adaptation of one of Stephen King's earliest works, one which gives stars Cooper Hoffman and David Jonsson a chance to shine in the midst of a very dark story.

Reviewed by Tom Jorgensen

The Long Walk is in theaters September 12th.

#TheLongWalk #Movies #IGN
title: The Long Walk Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies, an animated horror installment to the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. This series re-contextualizes the Marvel Universe as Earth's mightiest heroes go head-to-head against a zombie outbreak, turning even the strongest of them into undead nightmares. Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies will be a four-part event on September 24, streaming exclusively on Disney+.

After the Avengers are overtaken by a zombie plague, a desperate group of survivors discover the key to bringing an end to the super-powered undead, racing across a dystopian landscape and risking life and limb to save their world. 
 
Marvel Zombies stars Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Tessa Thompson, Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Hailee Steinfeld, Wyatt Russell, Randall Park, Iman Vellani, Dominique Thorne, and more. The series is executive produced by Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Dana Vasquez-Eber
title: Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies - Official Trailer (2025) Florence Pugh, Paul Rudd, Simu Liu

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Blitzcrank Gameplay Reveal Trailer for 2XKO, an upcoming 2v2 fighting game developed by Riot Games. 

Players can get a look at Blitzcrank in action, a kind-intentioned robot that packs a punch in combat. Blitzcrank is able to hit attacks in quick succession while using his size to his advantage. 

Play as Blitzcrank in 2XKO, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC, with a Closed Beta starting on September 9th for PC players! 

#IGN #2XKO #FightingGame
title: 2XKO - Official Blitzcrank Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Full Release Date Announcement Trailer for Arena Breakout: Infinite, an upcoming free-to-play first-person extraction shooter developed by Morefun Studios. 

Players will engage in high-stakes firefights in PvPvE combat encounters. Fight for powerful loot and extract to keep it in Arena Breakout: Infinite, launching on September 15 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #ArenaBreakoutInfinite #ReleaseDate
title: Arena Breakout: Infinite - Official Full Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the CGI Launch Trailer for Metal Eden, a first-person sci-fi action shooter developed by Reikon Games. 

Players will set out as ASKA, an android created on the basis of the human mind, to free the lost colony of Moebius. Take up arms with a suite of different weapons and abilities to dispatch enemies, gain upgrades, and save humanity in Metal Eden, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MetalEden #ActionGames
title: Metal Eden - Official CGI Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
With the gaming landscape becoming more and more integrated, Helldivers 2 from Arrowhead and PlayStation studios is a big release on Xbox Series X|S after a huge 1st year on PS5 and PC. 

Ported by Arrowhead and Nixxes, this will be based on the DX12 PC release but some changes and odd choices crop up in this port at launch. What are those changes? How does it perform? All and more covered in our Helldivers 2 IGN Performance review.

0:00 Introduction
0:41 Xbox modes of play and in-game metrics
1:14 PS5 vs Xbox Series X Graphics and resolutions
3:00 PS5 Pro graphics and modes summary 
3:31 Xbox Series S graphics and resolutions
5:46 PS5, Xbox Series X Performance testing
7:50 PC, PS5Pro GPU and CPU Performance
9:11 Xbox Series S Performance
10:30 Summary

#IGN #Helldivers2 #XboxSeriesX
title: Helldivers 2: Xbox Series X|S Performance Review - How Does it Compare to PS5 and PC?

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Into the Unjust' Update Launch Trailer for Helldivers 2, the hit third-person action multiplayer co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Games. Players can take the fight to the Terminid Hive Worlds by descending underground with new weapons, Strategems, armor sets, and more to spread democracy to the underworld. The 'Into the Unjust' Update is available now for Helldivers 2 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Helldivers2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Helldivers 2 - Official 'Into the Unjust' Update Launch Trailer
